data.title: Poetry in Urdu
data.meta_description: Poetry in Urdu - Free download as Text File (.txt), PDF File (.pdf) or read online for free. Urdu poetry is a rich tradition that originated in South Asia and has influenced cultures in the region and among South Asian diaspora worldwide. It has many poetic forms, some derived from Arabic, and is performed at public Mushairas recitals. Some of the most famous Urdu poets who have contributed to the development of the tradition include Meer, Ghalib, Iqbal, and Faiz. Urdu poetry remains popular in both India and Pakistan despite the division of the countries in 1947.
